title: Easy Ways to Get God's Chalice in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Defeating elite pirates.
steps.content: Defeating elite pirates. This is the most recommended way of getting the God's Chalice, even though it's a rarer drop. [1] X Research source First, you have to visit Castle on the Sea and talk with the Elite Hunter NPC to get a quest. After you have the quest, go kill Elite Pirate. The dialogue with the Elite Hunter will tell you where the Elite Pirate is. [2] X Research source You might have to repeat this process to get a God's Chalice.

steps.title: Praying at a gravestone.
steps.content: Praying at a gravestone. It's located in the Haunted Castle and you can only use it at night. As well as getting the God's Chalice, you'll also get a Hallowed Essence, $100,000, 1,000 bone fragments , and "The Devil's Luck" title. [3] X Research source You can only pray at the gravestone once per night.

steps.title: Looting a chest.
steps.content: Looting a chest. The God's Chalice drops once every 4 hours in chests, so you can't get one if someone else looted it within 4 hours. [4] X Research source This is a good way to get the God's Chalice if you're on a private server without a lot of other players. In that case, you can ensure that no one else loots the chests until you get your item.

steps.title: Summon the raid boss, rip_indra.
steps.content: Summon the raid boss, rip_indra. With God's Chalice, you need the Aura color buttons to summon the raid boss. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Get the Sweet Chalice.
steps.content: Get the Sweet Chalice. With 10 Conjured Cocoas, head to Chocolate Land and trade your God's Chalice for a Sweet Chalice, which can summon the Dough King. [6] X Research source
